name: RSVT 2019 CFP on Robotics Systems and Vehicle Technology in Wuhan, China
content: Conference official website：http://www.rsvt.org/ Meeting time：October 18-20, 2019\. Meeting place：Wuhan, China. Host unit：ACM Singapore Chapter. keynote speaker： Prof. Kyongsu Yi Seoul National University, South Korea. Prof. Bo-Chiuan Chen National Taipei University of Technology, Taiwan. Prof Shiqian Wu Wuhan University of Science and Technology (WUST), Wuhan. Prof. Zahari Taha Universiti Malaysia Pahang, Malaysia. Prof. Wai Yuen Szeto The University of Hong Kong. Published by： Accepted papers will be published into International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-6242-9), which is indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Inspec etc. Call for Papers： Biological Robotics. Control, Dynamics and Kinematics. Estimation and Learning for Robotic Systems. Field Robotics. Distributed Systems. Human-Robot Interaction and Human Centered Systems. Manipulation. Mechanisms and Micro/Nano Robotics. Important Dates Deadline (full text) : July 1, 2019\. Deadline (abstract) : July 25, 2019\. Registration Deadline:August 20, 2019\. Conference Contact :Mr.Paul Choo mailbox: rsvt@acm-sg.org Tel: +86-021-59561560
